medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient is a ___ year old female who presents with a 1 day history of vomiting and abdominal pain that started the previous evening in the mid epigastrium, without any radiation. The pain worsens with walking, movement, and urination.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Anxiety, depression, uterine fibroids, hypothyroidism, benign pituitary tumor, and herniated discs. Surgical history includes laparoscopic endometriosis surgery and endometrial polypectomy.
medical_history.family_history: Coronary artery disease in grandparents; mother with irritable bowel syndrome.
